textBeforeTable: Geometry: 11-36 Cassette SRAM X9 (10 speed) Rear Derailleur SRAM X7 High Clamp Front Derailleur SRAM S1000GXP Crank Magura MT2 Hydraulic Disc Brakes Brakes SRAM X7 Shifters Concept EX Grips Concept Saddle Concept EX Seatpost Concept EX Stem Concept EX Handlebar Continental Race King Tires Concept Wheels Rock Shox Bar Rear Shock RockShox XC 30 TK RL 100mm Fork Focus Super Bud Alloy Frame Ah, the Focus Super Bud 4.0! It’s a rare find. The Super Bud 4.0 is a high quality bike with high performance parts at a very affordable price. The Super Bud 4.0 was designed with the marathon rider in mind. The hydroformed aluminum frame provides maximum efficiency and is aesthetically pleasing. Zip and zoom through tight turns, and power through the straight aways.
